W

WebCrawler - Class in Impls
This class implements the WebCrawlerInterface which will crawl a website defined by the user following all links until a limit is reached.
WebCrawler() - Constructor for class Impls.WebCrawler
This creates a webcrawler using the default parameter.
WebCrawler(SearchCriteria) - Constructor for class Impls.WebCrawler
This creates a webcrawler using the default search limits (depth of 5 and maximum total links found of 20), but uses a user defined search function.
WebCrawler(int, int) - Constructor for class Impls.WebCrawler
This creates a webcrawler returning every link found up to a user defined limit.
WebCrawler(SearchCriteria, int, int) - Constructor for class Impls.WebCrawler
This creates a webcrawler with user defined limits on number of links and match return conditions.
WebCrawlerInterface - Interface in Interfaces
This is the interface for a Web Crawler.
